entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
